about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a junior full-stack developer with a passion for technology and software development. I'm currently pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at the Democritus University of Thrace.
about.p2: I hold an ECPE Proficiency certificate in English (C2 Level). I've been coding from 2023, building projects that range from web applications to slight game development.
